message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000, which is still a fair price considering the value of the product for you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $12,500 for the product. This is higher than my initial offer and closer to your last proposal. I hope this helps us reach an agreement.
